title: I can't make a PBE account
body: Yesterday I got accepted to have a PBE account, the only problem is that it won't let me make an account and i don't know what to do. Please help

replies.body: Yea I have the same problem as well. Just says Error:500 whenever I click the button in the email.
The 500 Error is an issue we're aware of and looking into.  Some players were able to workaround this by using a VPN.  It's not ideal or guaranteed to work, but worth a try.  Hope it's able to help!

Can you clarify what you mean by won't let you?  I looked into this for you and see that you successfully created your account yesterday.  You'll want to download the PBE, login, and create your Summoner Name.  I hope that helps!
Thank you so much, I guess I was really tired when I made my account. Thank you for your help
